name: qBittorrent Partial Download File
summary: Learn about .!QB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The !QB extension is used only if you check the "Append .!qB extension to incomplete files" option in the Downloads settings (Tools â†’ Options and then select Downloads). The option is unchecked by default.

description: A !QB file is an incomplete download file created by qBittorrent, a Torrent client. qBittorrent appends the ".!qB" extension to a file as it is being downloaded. The extension is removed when the download is complete. !QB files are similar to .!BT BitTorrent and .!UT uTorrent files.
